name: Titanic Kraken
description: A gigantic kraken known for its size and intensity, with tentacles that can grapple multiple targets and an enormous body covered in black ichor.
memorable: The Titanic Kraken's ability to swallow whole creatures and unleash storms makes it unforgettable in any encounter.
goals: To dominate the oceans and snatch up passing ships or intruders.
relations: Often associated with sea monsters, other krakens, or aquatic creatures.
environment: Deep ocean waters, often in turbulent or stormy conditions.
strengths: Immune to lightning damage and damage from nonmagical weapons; can summon storms and create ink clouds.
weaknesses: Requires a significant strategy to defeat, particularly in large bodies of water.
attacks: Devastating bite attack, powerful tentacle grapples, and can fling creatures with tremendous force.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to summon a storm that affects a large area and control the battlefield with ink clouds.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to detect hidden foes.
additional_information: Immortal nature: does not require air, food, or sleep.
Legendary Resistance: can succeed on failed saves.
Magic Resistance: advantage on saves against magic.
Siphons a heavy amount of acid damage when swallowed.
Spreads black ichor that lightly obscures its surroundings while bloodied.
test_queries: massive underwater creature with ink attacks
menacing sea beast with legendary powers
